description: To create, load, or save a project, select File â†’ Project and choose your desired action. When projects are created from scratch they are created with saved settings preloaded from when ConvertXtoDVD was first started. After you save a project, don't change the location of the source files or else the project will not load.

common_filenames.description: MyDVD.xtodvd - The default name given to a project by the application.
